lead_paragraph: Alabama’s star tailback injured his left knee late in practice Monday, and Coach Nick Saban said he would return in a “relatively short time.”
snippet: Alabama’s star tailback injured his left knee late in practice Monday, and Coach Nick Saban said he would return in a “relatively short time.”

headline.main: Alabama’s Ingram Out of Opener With Injury
headline.seo: Alabama’s Ingram Will Miss Opener After Knee Injury
headline.print_headline: Ingram Is Out Of Tide Opener With an Injury
